author: arnetheduck
content: The nimbus gui/beacon chain explorer (an old weekend experiment/toy) is now available from a stand-alone repo: https://github.com/arnetheduck/ngui - should work with any (rest-based) beacon node - I've only tested it with linux, but since it's Qt, it should be within reach to run on win/mac/android/etc - I use it in lieu of dora/beaconcha.in with my local node
